document.heading: Day Care Policy Act of 1979 Amendment Act of 1982

history.narrative: Law 4-163, the “Day Care Policy Act of 1979 Amendment Act of 1982,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-457, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 6, 1982, and July 20, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 29, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-237 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
